channel.title: Github on Homepage

item.title: Goodbye Squarespace, Hello Hugo
item.description: A Little History I originally developed my Squarespace webcomic template because I wasn’t happy with having to use Wordpress+ComicPress and I wanted another option. I latched on to Squarespace because it had a pretty robust developer platform and allowed for more customization than any other online website builder. Also, when I started, Squarespace was $8 a month, and cheaper than most hosting solutions, so it seemed like a great deal.
item.content:encoded: A Little History I originally developed my Squarespace webcomic template because I wasn’t happy with having to use Wordpress+ComicPress and I wanted another option. I latched on to Squarespace because it had a pretty robust developer platform and allowed for more customization than any other online website builder. Also, when I started, Squarespace was $8 a month, and cheaper than most hosting solutions, so it seemed like a great deal.
